data.title: Haider Uppal
data.meta_description:
Graduated by Haider Uppal, released 11 December 2023

1. Leafless
2. Stop Over
3. Mama Stole My Groove (ft. Saqib)
4. Absolute Grade
5. Cloud Control
6. Far from Home (ft. Joe Miller)
7. Dorm 309
8. Dream Bounce
9. Lali Cartel (ft. Frouzan)

With a distinct blend of influences, Haider's evolutionary sound journey spans melancholic dub-infused soundscapes and captivating grooves. 

The long play 'Graduated' was written during Haider's time in his Michigan dorm and Lahore home studio during a period when he was enrolled as a student before and after COVID-19.

It showcases his evolution as a music producer, with each track delivering a unique and autobiographical listening experience.

"Being pushed by my younger brother, mentors, friends and family to share my art with larger audiences, this self-release album has allowed me to curate my past sonic vision confidently, in the most authentic sense.

The mood floats around various shades of deep / house music. It showcases a journey of self exploration through a variety of sounds I resonate with. 

In essence, this was a necessary step for me to move forward today, parting ways with music that I felt deserved to be available to the public since its creation.
data.text:
Lahore born, multidisciplinary artist

With a unique blend of influences, Haider's evolving sound spans melancholic dub-infused soundscapes to captivating grooves.

Supported directly by influential artists like YokoO, Nabihah Iqbal and Lee Burridge, his original productions, remixes and collaborations on renowned record labels have propelled his global presence. ... more
